SA11sanss09u:1: tad evam aviratapravṛttāṃ bahusukhāṃ dauḥś-lyôtpattiṃ rakṣann evaṃ ca karmâvaraṇavibandham apanayan kleśaviśodhane prayateta //
SA11sanss09u:9: tatrâpi vikṣepapraśamanânabhiyuktasya cittaṃ na samādhīyatae iti /
SA11sanss09u:11: samāhitasya ca na kiñcit phalam anyatra kleśaśodhanād iti /
SA11sanss09u:26: yae ime ādhyātmikāḥ śokaparidevaduṣkha daurmanasyôpāyāsās tān kṣamate 'dhivāsayatîti //
SA11sanss09u:29: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate gṛhiṇā bodhisatvenânunayapratighâpagatena bhavitavyam aṣṭalokadharmânanuliptena /
SA11sanss09u:30: tena bhogalābhena vā bhāryāputralābhena vā dhanadhānyavittalābhena vā nônnamitavyaṃ na praharṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss09u:32: na durmanasā bhavitavyaṃ evaṃ cânena pratyavekṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss09u:41: yady asty eva pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim /
SA11sanss09u:44: taccintayā mudhā yānti hrasvam āyur muhur muhuḥ //
SA11sanss09u:51: duryodhanaṃ cittaṃ te dārike utpādayitavyaṃ sarvakleśanirghātāya /
SA11sanss09u:54: na câbhyāsasya duṣkaraṃ nāma kiñcid asti /
SA11sanss09u:55: tathā hi mūḍhatarāṇām api tāvad bhārahāraka-
SA11sanss09u:57: kaivartakarṣakâdīnāṃ duṣkhâbhyāsāt kṣudrataraphale 'pi vastuni saṃrūḍhakiṇâṅkitaṃ cittam avasādena na paribhūyate /
SA11sanss09u:59: tathā prākṛtâpi kiñcid apakāriṣv ātmaduṣkṛtenâiva hateṣu svayaṃ mṛtyuṣu prahartuṃ gāḍhaprahāravedanâpi saṃgrāmayanty eva /
SA11sanss09u:60_0: ki.ṃ punar drāghiṣṭhakālâpakāriṣu duṣkhôpāttakuśaladhanalavastainyeṣu narakeṣu nâvadhyaghātakeṣu
SA11sanss09u:60_2: anavadhikalpâbaddhadṛḍhavaireṣu kleśaśatruṣu prahartum utsāho duṣkhasahanaṃ vā na bhavet /
SA11sanss09u:64: tathā sarvaduṣkhôtpādeṣu sukhasaṃjñā pratyupasthānâbhyāsāt sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupatiṣṭhate /
SA11sanss09u:65: etan niṣyandaphalaṃ ca sarvadharmasukhâkrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratila-
SA11sanss09u:70: yasya samādheḥ pratilambhād bodhisatvaḥ sarvârambaṇavastuṣu sukhām eva vedanāṃ vedayate /
SA11sanss09u:72: tasya nairayikām api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanss09u:73: mānuṣīm api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya hasteṣv api chidyamāneṣu pādeṣv api karṇeṣv api nāsāsv api sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanss09u:74: vetrair api tāḍyamānasyârddhavetrair api kaśābhir api tāḍyamānasya sukhasaṃ-
SA11sanss09u:80: naḍacippitikaṃ vā cipyamānasya tailapradyotikaṃ vâdīpyamānasya sarpiḥpradyotikaṃ vā dadhipradyotikaṃ vâdīpyamānasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanss09u:81: ulkāmukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya siṃhamukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya śuṣkavarttikāṃ vā vartyamānasya //
SA11sanss09u:83: kārṣāpaṇacchedikaṃ vā chidyamānasya piṣṭapācanikaṃ vā pācyamānasya hastibhir vā mardyamānasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pravartate /
SA11sanss09u:84: akṣiṇy-utpāṭhyamāne jīvaśūlikam api kriyamāṇasya sarvaśo vâghātaṃ nirṇīya śirasi vā prapātyamāne sukhasaṃjñâiva pravartate /
SA11sanss09u:88: tathā hi bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dīrgharātraṃ caryāṃ caratâitat praṇidhānam abhūt /
SA11sanss09u:93: ye māṃ pālayeyuḥ satkuryur gurukuryur mānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuḥ sarve te upaśamasukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanss09u:94: ye 'pi mām ākrośeyur visparśeyus tāḍayeyuḥ śastreṇâchindyur yāvat sarvaśo jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ sarve te saṃbodhisukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanss09u:97: ebhiḥ praṇidhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvasatvânugatāṃ sukhasaṃjñām āsevate nisevate bhāvayati bahulīkaroti /
SA11sanss09u:98: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena sarvadharmasukhâkrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanss09u:99: yasmin samaye bodhisatvena sarvadharmasukhâkrānto nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdho bhavati tasmin samaye 'kṣobhyo bhavaty asaṃhāryaḥ sarvamārakarmabhir iti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanss09u:111: yāvad dharmânusmaraṇāt prītiḥ prasādaḥ prāmodyaṃ cittasyânavalīnatânavamṛdyatâparitarṣaṇā /
SA11sanss09u:113: cittasya prāmodyaṃ kāyasyâudbilyaṃ buddheḥ saṃpraharṣaṇaṃ manasôtplavaḥ /
SA11sanss09u:154: iti hi yā sarvêndriyeṣv anavalīnêndriyatêyam ucyate muditêty ādi //
SA11sanss09u:155: atra ca śikṣitān bodhisatvān idaṃ vacanam alaṃkaroti yad uktam āryamahāmeghe /
SA11sanss09u:156: nirayagaticittanityasamādhānaśīlāś ca nirayagatipriyāś ca nirayagatipattanavaṇijaś ca bhavanti /
SA11sanss09u:157: nirayalolāś ca bhavanti nirayalobhamatsariṇaś ca nirayâgnicittapraguṇṇāḥ bhavantîti //
SA11sanss09u:161: anāryair duḥśīlaiḥ satvair mārair mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir mārâdhiṣṭhitair vā māradūtair vā viheṭhyamānaḥ samīryamāṇaḥ kṣobhyamānas tarjyamānas tāḍyamāno na bhidyate tato /
SA11sanss09u:176: sarvasatvabhārāṃś ca sahate uttārayati vā na ca khidyate /
SA11sanss09u:192: sacet punar ete satvā yāvanto daśasu dikṣu prabhāvyamānāḥ prabhāvyante te sarve 'siśaktitomarapāliyogena māṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubadhnīyuḥ /
SA11sanss09u:193_0: yatrâiṣa pṛthivīpradeśe sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā caṅkramyamāṇo vā śayāno vā bodhicittam
SA11sanss09u:193_1: utpādayiṣyati dānacittaṃ vā yāvat prajñācittaṃ vā śrutakuśalamūlacittaṃ vôtpādayiṣyati
SA11sanss09u:193_2: tatrâsya pṛthivīpradeśe śatadhābadarīpattrapramāṇaṃ kāyaṃ chetsyāmo vikariṣyāmo vidhvaṃsayiṣyāmas /
SA11sanss09u:194_0: te cet sarvasatvā mām ākrośayeyuḥ paribhāṣeran kutsayeyuḥ paṃsayeyur asatyābhir vāgbhiḥ
SA11sanss09u:194_2: mama kāyaṃ chindhyur bhindyur vikareyur vidhvaṃsayeyuḥ /
SA11sanss09u:195: evaṃ mayā na kasyacit satvasyântike kṣobhacittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss09u:197_0: pūrvā koṭiḥ saṃsārasyâpramāṇīkṛtā yatra me 'yam ātmabhāvo narakagatasyâpi tiryagyonigatasyâpi
SA11sanss09u:197_1: yamalokagatasyâpi manuṣyagatasyâpi kāmâhārapaliguddhasya dharmān aśrutavato viṣamâjīvagocarasya
SA11sanss09u:197_2: nirarthakajīvinaḥ aṅgapratyaṅgasya śatadhā chinno bhinno nikṛtto vividhābhiś ca kāraṇābhiḥ
SA11sanss09u:197_3: kārito na ca mayā tato nidānam ātmârthaṃ kṛto na parârthaḥ /
SA11sanss09u:198: sacet punar punar mamâite sarvasatvâparântakoṭiṃ chindyur bhindyur vikireyur vidhvaṃsayeyus tathâpi mayâparityaktâiva sarvajñatā /
SA11sanss09u:207: nairayikasya duṣkhasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaiti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
SA11sanss09u:209: na punar mayā buddhadharmāḥ parityaktavyā na sarvasatvârambaṇā mahākaruṇā //
SA11sanss09u:216: evaṃ dharmagaṇanâviṣṭaḥ sāgaramate bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvapīḍāṃ sahate //
SA11sanss09u:220: yat kāye chidyamāne sarvasatvān maitryā spharati /
SA11sanss09u:223: yat kāye chidyamāne yâivâsya kāyaṃ chindati teṣām eva pramokṣârthaṃ kṣamate /
SA11sanss09u:224: na ca cittena kṣaṇyate kṣāntibalaṃ côpadarśayatîyam asya kṣāntipāramitā //
SA11sanss09u:225: yena vīryeṇa taṃ sarvajñatāchandaṃ nôtsṛjati cittabalâdhīnaṃ ca pratigṛhṇāti /
SA11sanss09u:229: yat kāye vikīryamāṇe tat sarvajñatācittôtpādaratnaṃ kartuṃ na saṃmuhyati bodhim evâpekṣate śāntapraśāntam eva pratyavekṣate /
SA11sanss09u:231: yat kāye chidyamāne kāyasya tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyavatpratibhāsôpamatāṃ pratyavekṣate māyādharmatāṃ ca kāyasyâvatarati /
SA11sanss09u:232: bhūtânityatāṃ ca bhūtaduṣkhatāṃ ca bhūtânātmatāṃ ca bhūtaśāntatāṃ ca kāyasyôpanidhyāyati /
SA11sanss09u:240: eṣâiva tāvan mayā satvaḥ pūrvataraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss09u:245: īdṛśānām asmābhiḥ satvānām adāntānām aguptānām anupaśāntānām arthāya saṃnŌühŌüḥ saṃnaddhavyŌüḥ //
SA11sanss09u:258: lābhā me durlabdhā yo 'haṃ jalpite pratijalpāmi /
SA11sanss09u:259: yena mayā sarvasatvānāṃ saṃkramabhūtena bhavitavyaṃ so 'haṃ parasya tvam ity api vācaṃ bhāṣe /
SA11sanss09u:263: parato duruktān durāgatān durbhāṣitān bhāṣyamāṇān vacanapathān śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nâghātayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss09u:264: pareṣām antike na mamâitat sādhu na pratirūpaṃ yo 'haṃ parasya doṣântaraṃ saṃjanayeyam /
SA11sanss09u:265: etan na mama pratirūpaṃ yad ahaṃ pareṣāṃ doṣântaram api saṃśrotavyaṃ manye /
SA11sanss09u:267: na mayâśayo vikopayitavyo yena mayā sarvasatvāḥ sarvasukhôpadhānena sukhayitavyāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāś cânuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya tatra nāmâhaṃ vyāpadye /
SA11sanss09u:268: na ca mayā pareṣāṃ svaparāddhānām api vyāpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanss09u:272: na mayā jīvitântarāye 'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanss09u:275: ye kruddhāḥ satvās tān āśvāsayati kṣamāpayati /
